fields.label: Message
fields.message: Enable this option so that a section of recent posts is displayed throughout the site. You can override this individually when editing each page.

fields.label: Enable Dark Mode
fields.name: news_enable_dark_mode
fields.instructions: Enable this option if the background color of this section is dark. This will make the texts white.

fields.label: Enable Separator Line
fields.name: news_enable_separator_line
fields.instructions: Enable this option for a dash to be displayed below the section.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: news_description
fields.default_value: These are the Latest Posts from our Blog.

fields.label: Enable Button
fields.name: enable_news_button
fields.instructions: Enable this option for a button to be displayed next to the title. This is useful for directing visitors to the blog's homepage.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Enable this option so that the subscriber form is displayed throughout the site. You can override this individually when editing each page.

fields.label: Enable Dark Mode
fields.name: subscribe_enable_dark_mode
fields.instructions: Enable this option if the background color of this section is dark. This will make the texts white.

fields.label: Enable Separator Line
fields.name: subscribe_enable_separator_line
fields.instructions: Enable this option for a dash to be displayed below the section.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: subscribe_description
fields.default_value: Subscribe to our Newsletter to stay informed firsthand.

fields.label: Sending Options
fields.name: subscribe_sending_options
fields.instructions: Choose where subscriber data should be sent to.

fields.label: Webhook URL
fields.name: subscribe_webhook_url
fields.instructions: The webhook option is recommended for integrations.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Enable this option so that the multi step form is displayed throughout the site. You can override this individually when editing each page.

fields.label: Enable Dark Mode
fields.name: form_enable_dark_mode
fields.instructions: Enable this option if the background color of this section is dark. This will make the texts white.

fields.label: Enable Separator Line
fields.name: form_enable_separator_line
fields.instructions: Enable this option for a dash to be displayed below the section.

fields.label: Sending Options
fields.name: form_sending_options
fields.instructions: Choose where subscriber data should be sent to.

fields.label: Webhook URL
fields.name: form_webhook_url
fields.instructions: The webhook option is recommended for integrations.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Here you can create up to 3 steps for the form. Enable it on the form-options tab or individually on each page.

fields.label: Success Message
fields.name: success_message
fields.default_value:
Thank you.

Your message has been sent successfully.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: step_image
sub_fields.instructions: Each step needs an image that is positioned to the right of the form.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: step_description
sub_fields.default_value: Fill out the form below and we will contact you as soon as possible.

sub_fields.label: Fields
sub_fields.name: step_fields
sub_fields.instructions: Add the fields that will be requested in this step.

sub_fields.label: Info Option
sub_fields.name: info_option
sub_fields.instructions: This text will be at the top of the Select Field.

sub_fields.name: field
sub_fields.instructions: Enter each choice on a new line.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Enable this option so that the custom feature is displayed throughout the site. You can override this individually when editing each page.

fields.label: Enable Dark Mode
fields.name: custom_enable_dark_mode
fields.instructions: Enable this option if the background color of this section is dark. This will make the texts white.

fields.label: Enable Separator Line
fields.name: custom_enable_separator_line
fields.instructions: Enable this option for a dash to be displayed below the section.

fields.label: Enable Title
fields.name: enable_custom_title
fields.instructions: Enabling the title, ensures that the section maintains the design pattern.

fields.label: Custom
fields.name: custom
fields.instructions: Here you can create anything. Even use shortcodes from plugins, such as forms and galleries. On the pages you can choose individually to show this content or not.
